m_szDocSumamry: Text of State of the Union address THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published 10:00Â pm, Tuesday, January 31, 2006 Text of President Bush's State of the Union address on Tuesday, prepared for delivery, as released by the White House: Mr. Speaker, Vice President Cheney, members of Congress, members of the Supreme Court and diplomatic corps, distinguished guests and fellow citizens: Today our nation lost a beloved, graceful, courageous woman who called America to its founding ideals and carried on a noble dream. Tonight we are comforted by the hope of a glad reunion with the husband who was taken from her so
